extendedInfo.description: Grow is not your typical fish game where you wait for your pet fish to grow and mindlessly tap on the screen to feed it. Weâre not catching fishes today so go ahead and throw away your fishing equipments. Donât go bothering the angry birds, theyâll never be happy with their revenge. Be ready to be hungry, very hungry, even hungrier than a shark because, in Grow, your job is to eat everything in the aquarium!Reviews:"4.5/5 Grow is massively addictive."androidtapp.com"5/5 What an awesome game."androidgamesreview.com"Extremely addictive."androidrundown.com "Grow is a fun, casual time-killer that anyone can enjoy."android-apps.com "[Grow] is a unique and enjoyable ride thatâs worth returning to once its done."androidspin.comYou are a little fish with a big appetite and dreams. So you eat. And eat. Till eventually, you Grow. From a cramped jar to the open sea, play the adventure mode  to explore different habitats. Collect coins to upgrade power-ups in the shop, then test your skills in survival mode, where endless hours of replay and online leader board awaits.Features:* 78 levels with 7 stunning environments* Two difficulty modes, Normal and Advanced, with their own star rankings* 7 endless survival levels with global leader board* Three control options: tilt, virtual joystick, and  touch-and-move* Supports Left/Right handed control options* Five unique power-ups with 17 upgrades to unlock* Six types of enemies with unique behaviorsIf you have questions or need support, please email, support[at]epicpixel.com

reviews.title: Lots of fun
reviews.comment: Its a simple game and very entertaining. i beat it already but still want to keep playing and improving the score and powerup
reviews.author: Rob P

reviews.title: Addictive like heroin
reviews.comment: Innovative game that will keep u busy for Hrs love the tilt control option. IV played game repeatedly still has me hooked.
reviews.author: Andrew Miller

reviews.title: Really good game...
reviews.comment: Life as a fish isn\'t easy, eat a lot of smaller fish to grow or blink and be eaten by a bigger fish. This is the only game where I find myself talking aloud,telling my little friend to swim faster.
reviews.author: Salvador Paniagua

reviews.title: Nicely done, entertaining
reviews.comment: Game works as advertised. Three control choices, pick the one that works for you (I prefer virtual joystick). The only annoyances are occasional reminders to rate the game and some spelling errors, so deduct half a star for that, but l will round up to 5 stars.
reviews.author: Kenneth Fiester

reviews.title: Fun and unique
reviews.comment: It\'s not just a fish game, it\'s a fish game\'s with more. I could play this for hours. Collecting the coins is a little annoying at first, but getting the magnet upgrade makes things easier. Definitely worth it!
reviews.author: Kendra Moore

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: Once I started playing it I just couldn\'t stop! Love it!
reviews.author: anmz95

reviews.title: Very Addicting, Easy to Learn and Play
reviews.comment: Very easy game to just pick up and go. Its addicting in the few minutes you put into it, allows you to earn coins used to buy power ups.  Pay $1.00 and get the game. No investing required other than that single dollar. Way better than Angry Birds. If you think the adventure is easy, hit up the survival mode and see if you got what it takes to make the leaderboards.  The single con is the game can\'t rotate the opposite way. I find myself touching my menu keys half the time during a really intense game.
reviews.author: Aurelio Arroyo

reviews.title: Haha! Love it!
reviews.comment: Awesome little game
reviews.author: Catherine Schindler

reviews.title: Rating begging
reviews.comment: I\'d rate it four stars, and did in an earlier version, but after an update it kept begging me to rate again. Here you go, lowest possible for pestering me.
reviews.author: Liam Phoenix

reviews.title: HTC EVO and GS3
reviews.comment: I love this game..... You get sucked into it. But, I don\'t think it was worth paying for it. Good thing it was only a dollar.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Pretty good.
reviews.author: Sebastian Hanna-Garcia

reviews.title: Awesome game! It\'s totally worth it
reviews.comment: Get this amazing time waster
reviews.author: Ryan Nowicki

reviews.title: I like it
reviews.comment: This game is very fun to play.
reviews.author: Anthony C

reviews.comment: I love this game it keeps me coming back again and again
reviews.author: Violet Bloom

reviews.title: Really fun
reviews.comment: I got stuck playing this game for like 2 hours when I first installed it. Beat it all in like 3 days... I really liked it! One of the games that I\'m glad I purchased
reviews.author: Matthew Castro

reviews.title: yay
reviews.comment: i love this game
reviews.author: Nicole Piasecki

reviews.title: almost 5 star
reviews.comment: love it and got addicted since 1st install. 5 star if i can readjust sensitivity level for joystick
reviews.author: Citra Pratiwi

reviews.title: Loved it?
reviews.comment: Simplistic in its execution, yet completely engaging! Completed the game twice and will continue to play it.
reviews.author: Isaiah Williams

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Great Game.. Very Fun
reviews.author: Vanessa Astorga

reviews.title: Lg esteem
reviews.comment: Runs smooth and never had a force close. Kids love it and i love it.
reviews.author: Angel daniel
